entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Make sure arguments & argumentpropagesnullability has same size #25854
  • Query/Sqlite: AddMonths and AddTicks translation may lead to small result discrepancies vs l2o #25851
  • SQLite: ValueGeneratedOnAdd doesn't work on GUID column that is not a key #25847
  • Cast error when using InMemoryDb (tests) and GetColumnType() #25844
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Equals with StringComparison.Ordinal #25842
  • Create period columns as hidden #25841
  • remove redundant null semantics terms involving non-null parameters #25838

Closed

  • Query/Test: northwind tests don't have predefined entity asserters #25834
    6.0.0
  • .UseSqlite : Does not apply HasQueryFilter correctly on "include" childrens properties #25800
  • ThenInclude after Take on a ICollection Property generate a wrong sql #23041
    6.0.0
  • Incorrect results when selecting reference collection navigation chain on keyless entity #21828
    6.0.0
  • SQLite: Unable to handle Take nested in Select #21078
    6.0.0
  • Query: chaining multiple collections of weak entities throws during compilation #17803
    6.0.0
  • Support backwards `OfType` #17364
    6.0.0
  • Query: "Value can not be null" in runtime for complex query with weak entities, SelectMany on navigation chain with DefaultIf Empty #13560
    6.0.0
  • [Always Encrypted] EF Core 5.0 Operand type clash : nvarchar(4000) is incompatible with decimal(19,3) #25713
    6.0.0
  • Add CodeGeneratedAttribute to migrations/snapshots #25820
  • How to compare json string when using JsonValueConverter #25823
  • Improve exception message for instance or inline value converter with compiled model #25738
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Why does my non-nullable navigation property have a nullable backing field? #23588
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Add regression test for #23784 #25855
  • Query: Add regression test for #23658 #25853
  • SqlServer: Ignore Fks whose principal table data is not found #25852
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25848
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Reset unknown original value when current value is set #25837
  • Reuse some IExecutionStrategy instances. #25836

Merged

  • Fix to #25834 - Query/Test: northwind tests don't have predefined entity asserters #25849
  • Adding regression tests for some issues fixed earlier #25835
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25845
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Set the DbType on parameters wherever possible #25840
    providers-beware
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25825
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Be more explicit about which overloads of HasConversion to use with compiled model #25816
  • Configure requiredness based on NRT even if principal end might be ambiguous. #25831

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.5 #25730
    blocked
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25787
    closed-duplicate, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
